Text: RE Im Leaving Enronthat is so far away We will miss you You are a good ally Best of luck great opportunity From SMTP Sent Friday March AM To KADDENCOM KADDENCOM Devon Kehoe TomO ernercom judy WPPORG Subject Im Leaving Enron I am going to be the Senior Regulatory Counsel at ISO New England starting on April My last day in the Portland area will be March I enjoyed working with you and wish you the best of everything My new address will be Mary Hain Senior Regulatory Counsel ISO New England Inc One Sullivan Road Holyoke MA SONEcom
